title: Client Crash mid Ranked game then Client patch
body:
I was in the middle of a ranked game, Then the client suddenly closed on me, no bug splat or anything. When i tried to reload the client the game started patching for 15 minutes. When i finally patched and rejoined the game, We pulled it together and won the game. Afterwards it came up saying that leavebuster put me in a low priority queue (10 Minute Wait to get into a queue) (This was the firs time this had happened and that i left a game/Afked)

I sent in a support ticket requesting that that low priority queue be removed from my account. and all i got back was a generic retarded ass excuse for a response from a ticket from any game i have ever played ever. Now ive played games with bad support teams... but i think riot takes the cake. They dont read your support tickets anymore, They simply just see the title, see what its about and reply too it with a pre-made message that raises more questions than it actually answers.

here's the response i got.
>  "JEPROX Today at 00:52
> Hello Summoner,
> 
> Your account was audited by our new LeaverBuster system. Due to a recent left game or AFK on your account, LeaverBuster has placed you into a low-priority queue. For more information on the revamped LeaverBuster system, refer to our new FAQ:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714
> 
> We will be unable to modify your current LeaverBuster punishment, but if a technical issue is causing you to be disconnected from your games, please let me know and we can explore solutions.
> 
> jeProx 
> Player Support Specialist 
>  Demacia's Lead Marksman

For a "Specialist Support" they dont seem to even want to do their job. its quite pathetic that a game company as big as riot can allow people like this to work in a support team. I've spent well over $3000 on this game over my time playing the game since season 1. When i send in a support ticket i expect to get atleast something of a humanoid response... but nope, riot cant afford to pay them apparently.....

wut

But yeah, I personally think that they are red robots.
